name: WA-Web - Dark Skin [WITH MORE CONTRAST]
description: Original skin by skinfactory was a bit too pale to my tastes so I made a couple of tweake to make it stand out a bit more with more contrast and colored top bar. Hope you like it and please rate!
additional_info:
22.8.2016
Fixed toolbar color when forwarding messages.

20.8.2016 
Updated to new whatsapp web with chat bubble tails
Fixed color when loading a chat and also fixed the color of the top bar when viewing message info.
